jobDescription: Worker Sub-Type:Student (Fixed Term) Job Description:POSITION SUMMARY BlackBerry AtHoc is looking to hire a software Intern to join our San Mateo Enterprise Engineering team to help deliver on cloud and mobile apps. This developer will join a development team to learn how to build and deploy our products. This developer will help be responsible for designing and implementing features on our platform across all products.  Location: San Mateo  Length of Term: 4 Months RESPONSIBILITIESDeveloper will focus on cloud and mobile aspects for BlackBerry AtHoc product. Participate in code reviews, bug tracking and project management.Be part of the team to develop highly scalable cloud service and feature rich mobile applications.Learn under the tutelage of Engineering team on building and testing features on our productsDemonstrate consistent improvement in problem solving skills and task management.SKILLS AND QUALIFICATIONSWorking towards a degree in computer science, computer engineering or a related field.Understands software design patterns, principles and development lifecycle.Familiar with at least one of modern programming language (Java, C#, C++, Python, etc).Has experience in data processing, analytics, business intelligence, and reporting.Exposure of SQL programming.Excellent inter-personal/communications skills.Job Family Group Name:Business Practices & OperationsScheduled Weekly Hours:40
